text:
Jof Davies engineered and operated MTDCNC’s podcast and Tech Corner production workflows.

For podcasts:
- Multicamera recording with ATEM-controlled switching.
- Live-to-tape production or continuous recording for later assembly.
- Audio capture, cleaning, tone balancing, and monitoring.
- Rapid turnaround workflows for editors.

For Tech Corners:
- Jof typically performs the roles of camera operator, vision mixer, audio technician, and editor.
- Close-up sequences are captured separately and reintegrated during editing.
- Content is structured for clarity, consistent branding, and technical accuracy.
- Jof completes 12–20 Tech Corner productions per year currently, previously handling far more volume during earlier years.

These workflows combine AV engineering, editing, structure, and brand consistency.
